body:
Who we are:

youngculture is part of NSM Engineering, a Swiss software engineering group of companies, which provides near-shore services for aviation, banking, telecommunications, eCommerce, and many other sectors. Its headquarters are in Zurich and it has its own near-shore development centers in Serbia (Belgrade, Nis) and Romania (Iasi).

With the approach to deliver high quality software solutions for our international customers we are looking for motivated new colleagues, to join our growing Iasi software engineering team in the following position:

JAVA DEVELOPER - eCommerce (Regular & Senior)

You will be part of our agile team engaged in the development of a top enterprise e-commerce platform. You will contribute with your expertise in creating high-quality code on customizations and solutions with use of Java Enterprise, Spring framework and Web Services.

Who we are looking for:

The ideal candidate hired into this position should have the following key skills /experience:
•	Bachelor or higher degree in computer science (or equivalent)
•	2-5+ years of professional experience in software development using Java. Previous work in e-commerce projects, agile methodologies and distributed development teams would be considered as assets
•	Very good understanding of OOP principles, design patterns and practices
•	Experience using Spring framework (Core, MVC, Integration, Security), REST Web Services, and ORM technologies (JPA/Hibernate) 
•	Experience in web development (JSP, JavaScript/JQuery, Ajax, HTML5, CSS)
•	Ability to interpret and communicate information to the client
•	Open and friendly personality, as well as drive, initiative, problem-solving mindset,  excellent interpersonal and team-working skills
•	Good verbal and written communication skills in English
•	Knowledge of German will be considered as an asset
•	Availability for abroad business trips.

What we offer:
•	Challenging projects in a highly professional, but also relaxed, collaborative and supportive environment
•	Working in small and excellent skilled teams
•	Opportunity for long term professional growth within our development center
•	Salaries and conditions which correspond to the high demands
•	Modern office space in the city center
•	Travel opportunities to EU countries.

Working location:
Iasi, Romania

Please send your resume to jobs.romania@youngculture.com. 
While we appreciate everyone’s interest in youngculture’s openings, notice that only selected candidates will be contacted.
Your application will be treated strictly confidential.
title: Java Developer - eCommerce (Regular & Senior)
